name: KeepYourWormAlive
description:
This game made by 

Game Designer, Programmer - Murat Tunc 

Artist - Irem Zeynep Er 

for Ludum Dare 51 theme was “Every 10 Seconds”. 

Used Unity, Aseprite, AudaCity. Background musics by

tkky- https://freesound.org/people/tkky/sounds/521785/
